topic.title: Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected end of JSON input
topic.body:
### environment

  * ZeroNet version: rev3477
  * Operating system: win7
  * Web browser: chrome
  * Tor status: always
  * Opened port: no
  * Special configuration: no

### 2: Describe the problem:
[127.0.0.1-1529077438569.log](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/files/2106685/127.0.0.1-1529077438569.log)

Error after hard disk fulled 

I can't public any message

unzip a new zeronet.zip and recover 3 JSON files. Still wrong.

I found it maybe cause by JSON file problem

### How can I fixed it??? Help please, Thanks a lot!

1604066567_mirrored_gogonkt_github.body:
?wrapper_nonce=cd9143f702d28366769e820a4dae27c75b30e5bd19f4360ba6b295e129a0923d:1 Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected end of JSON input
    at JSON.parse (<anonymous>)
    at Object.<anonymous> (all.js?lang={lang}:5568)
    at ZeroMe.ZeroFrame.onMessage (all.js?lang={lang}:2831)
    at all.js?lang={lang}:2772
